commitResults.messageTitle: Change chatbot name from Duke to XiaoMe

commitResults.messageBody: Let's create a chatbot that simnply greets the user and exits

XiaoMe now echos the input back to the user. XiaoMe exits when the user
types the command bye.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level1-2: implement add and list commands
commitResults.messageBody:
XiaoMe now stores whatever text entered by the user. The texts are
displayed back to the user when the user types the command list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extension A-Classes: Add new class Task to represent tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
A task list is now represented using Task class instead of a
multi-dimensional array containing primitive values.

 This is a more natural approach and allows for further addition of
 features, such as task deadlines and priorities.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level1-3: Implement the ability to mark tasks as done and undone
commitResults.messageBody:
Users are now able to mark tasks as done/undone by typing the
command mark/unmark followed by an integer corresponding to the number
assigned to that task in the task list.
Tweaked the code to comply with coding standard.

Classes Deadline, Event, and Todo inherit from Task class. These classes
 are used to support multiple task types.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for tracking 3 types of tasks: ToDos, Deadlines, Events
commitResults.messageBody:
ToDos: tasks without any date/time attached to it
Deadlines: tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time
Events: tasks that start at a specific date/time and ends at a specific date/time

commitResults.messageTitle: Handle error with try and catch Prevents XiaoMe from crashing due to invalid user input by handling these errors.
Add and use new class XiaoMeException Use of exceptions to handle errors, and XiaoMeException to handle invalid commands.
Move tasks-related classes to new package task This improves the readability of the code.
